sense.def:
Z izrazom
precise
poudarimo, da nekaj opisujemo pravilno in natančno.

seg.quote: At that precise moment we were interrupted by the telephone.
The precise nature of the disease has not yet been established.
He was furious, precisely because he had not been consulted.

sense.def:
Kar je
precise
, je natančno in pravilno.

seg.quote: Mr Jones gave him precise instructions.
The timing had to be very precise.
He made the knots precisely, losing no time.
